title: Family treasures
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Penny Morison and ACMI
brief_description: Penny Morison provides a sensorial experience as she recalls her many holidays spent at the family holiday home in Aireys Inlet, on the south-west coast of Victoria. Run by her aunt, the holiday home has provided countless Summer memories for Penny as she was growing up and for future generations.
